WRITING.TITLE: First trip to the mirr
WRITING.TEXT: Following the wastelander update I decide to give this game another go, played casual when it first came out and go carried through the game by high level friend so would consider myself a newbie despite being around a first release. I decided to do it solo this time, experience the country roads at my own speed, take it slow, see what there is to see. Fast forward to the mire. I remember the mire. Terrifyingly beautiful. I knew soloing the game would be tough so safe to say I was nervous but I have done the main quest up to the free state and decided to do side quests and events to prepare. I was not prepared for this. I set off near the mega rocket station, thinking I could handle this if I play smart. First house I got to was packed with ferals, easy. Start picking them off and then get the misc quest 'kill a wendigo wearing a clown outfit' HELL NO. Those things have freaked me out ever since getting lock in a elevator and it trying do nasty things to me. So I keep moving. Finally enter the mire. Nerves high. Heart pounding. I got this tho because I am playing smart and was smart to avoid the wendigo. I saw a legendary. I got greed. Legendary mirelurk on it's own. Weird but I wasnt complaining, easy kill, get rewards, trashy hatchet. Was not worth it when I turn to see the mirelurk hunters, the razor claws and the goddamn queen creeping up behind me. Play smart, phantom device, high tail it out of there. Turns out there was a pack of scorched and feral dogs kicking about to and my device set them off. Absolute mayhem. Snarling and screeching is all I could hear as I high tail i towards abbies bunker. That was the boarded of the mire. I decide that I still got this. Just gotta play safe. Head down the highway to the next bunker with my head held high that I didn't bail. It is worth mentioning that I hadn't played any of the other dlcs nor looked into them much. Radstags. I know what you're thinking. Dinner. Massive group of them on the road, I'll get some dinner while I'm still alive. Mistake. Sheepsquatch are a thing apparently. What a horrendous horrific creature. Came storming into the middle of the stag herd and went ballistic. Radstags running everywhere including towards me. My character has low luck so obviously it would chase the stag coming straight at me. Radstags gone, belly empty, me still terrified of the mire. Oh and I'm dead. I'll try again tomorrow...
Worse that giant mr crabs and demented Shaun the sheep? #128563;

WRITING.TITLE: Fashionable outfits
WRITING.TEXT: Hey does anyone know what the fashionable raider and fashionable settler outfits look like? Can't find picture anywhere!
Is that raider or settlers outfit?

I was quite lucky to find 5 squirrels and rabbits in around the white springs bunker. Thinks more likely to find them when there aren't players and camps around but could be wrong. I had to server hop for all the rest of the animals
Read somewhere that the weapon stealing had been fixed? Could be wrong tho
Might be because they had radiation damage and couldn't be healed anymore

WRITING.TITLE: [PS4] H: western outfit, W: blue ridge caravan backpack plans and/or caps

WRITING.TEXT: Also interested in both plans. Will give you junkies gatling plasma and western outfit
Will give western outfit for blue ridge backpack plans
Would you trade the backpack plans for a western outfit?
Would you trade backpack plans for western outfit?
Raiders could have you raiding one of the small homesteads dotted around Settlers maybe defend homesteads from ghoul, scorch or raider invasions. Simple event but bonus rep

Absolutely. I would love to see a sort of ground war where the event has one faction taking a location from another but could see that easily become PVP and that would probably put people off. But rewards and plans would be themed to the faction that won.
Don't remember the name but loved solitude home for imperial plays
That's the fancy revolver. Has a unique skin. There is also a fancy pump shotgun
You can wear a gas mask with the hood tho

Solo as all my friends moved on. So I built a character that can solo game. Haven't tried to solo major events like SQB. If I missing company then I run events and if someone else is running them I sent them a team event and follow them between events.

Only ever encountered but haven't been seeking them out or playing much events. First encounter was walking down the mire highway slightly south of abbies bunker, saw some radstags running towards me and then monstrosity following not far behind. Didnt end well Second time was outside lucky hole mine; on my way to farm lead ore. Fast traveled there, heard a weird noise behind me. Turns out the noise was a brahim getting torn apart by a legendary mutated Shaun the sheep. I hid in a hut and hoped the cultist would help. They didn't. Slow pick away at it from the safety of my wooden shack and then went about my mining
Gotta stick with the overseer till you inoculated everyone
She sends you to both settler and raiders, I think the quest is called new arrivals. Complete that and follow on from there

WRITING.TITLE: [Discussion] What is considered god rolls and what is a legacy?
WRITING.TEXT: Only recently reached lvl 50 and wanted to start looking at my gear at get some decent stuff but ngl, I have no clue what I'm looking for. I am a stealth commando and love it. I don't run bloodied or junkie or anything like that as don't want to be ridiculously OP as I like a bit of challenge so I guess what I'm asking is, what should I be looking for? And for the love of good what is a legacy and why are they so special?

So legacy only come from other players. I assume they don't drop anymore because they were OP as well? I guess I'm looking out for furious, explosives with some sort or vast buff then. Thank you so much for explaining that, wasnt getting anywhere on my own!
All about the combination of effects, rather that get a certain one. Would a bloodied, junkie or two shot be worth much on their own?
They've been disabled... woohoo...
Any indication on how likely this will take? I wasn't around last time they disabled them but only missed it by a day or 2

You can have as many as you want, I would suggest you look into them and pick the mutations that suit your build. As far as managing them goes: you cannot cure selectied mutations. It all RNG. I had 6 and wanted to get rid of one because it is bugged and it was the last one to go... Easiest way to get them is to buy serums as you are granted to get the ones you want and not waste time with the ones you dont. To ensure you keep them when using rad away I would highly suggest max rank starched genes perk. You'll never lose them or gain new ones from radiation
Ha thank you! I was looking for the same advice about a week ago

You wont be able to get anymore with the perk card from normal rads so you'll need to get the serums. Easiest way to get them is player vendors for 200-300 caps but that isn't possibly atm... You can buy the recipes later on but they are very expensive
Really? That's exciting. First time getting a weapon worth that. What about the other handmade?
I'm gonna hang onto it for awhile as it is currently one of my better weapons but that's for your help!

RustyRadish

I would suggest bringing a friend a long. Can go solo and it is still great but there somethings that you'll prefer to with other players, like events, and I usually end up running it alone. Still got bugs but it has come far since its release. The community of players is what has kept it going and you'll end up meeting some decent people. If you do take it up I would suggest going slow to start with, dont rush into the main quests.

WRITING.TITLE: 1h melee build help
WRITING.TEXT: Wanna create a new toon and try a melee build as never done that before. I found this build and would like to know if it is any good as I haven't a clue what's is best. I know I wanna go 1h melee and probably use knives for the speed rather than 2h heavy hitting https://nukesdragons.com/fallout76/perks?v=1 amp;s=f38478b amp;d=s50si0sj0sf2sg2se2ss2pe2e52ej4c72i11i44a04au2l22lu2lt2l71 amp;n=Melee%201-handed I dont really want to run junkie or bloodied as I dont want to have to rely on being drugged up or have to rely on eating a lot of food or certain foods. Or should I just run shotgun build instead... I'm at a lost and would love some help #128077;

As far as rifles go I was gonna pick up each of the rifleman parks as I went so can switch to that when I need too. What would you suggest instead if vaccinated? I was thinking adamantium limbs or life giver? Is getting crippled a regular thing for melee builds?
I got one from the wayward quest line. The one where you go to robot shop

WRITING.TITLE: More Customisation
WRITING.TEXT: Ngl, I would love to see more customisation. More colour options More character options The ability to pick all colours for bases rather than being stuck with just the set combinations The ability to change the ship colours Change the multitool colours If we doing those little bits, maybe push it big and let us be able to assemble our own ship from recycled parts that effects the stats of the ship Let us build our own multitool that also effect the stats In a universe where everything could be anything, I would love to see that the same for everything else
Absolutely. If we can changed colours of ourselves, bases and exocrafts then why not do the same for everything? I think multitools need to stop being pink and green tbh #128514;

Never got it but did get the bit where I could preview it and just needed to gather the parts. If you just do all the event quests, low rank to master rank then it should unlock. I have played the monster hunter for quite a few months but if I remember correctly I never got it because you need to hunt tempered elder dragons in the guided land.

WRITING.TITLE: Got my eggs scrambled
WRITING.TEXT: I was very kindly and very randomly given a cracking void egg last night in the hope to get the living ship. Unfortunately it isnt the original void egg then you dont get the quest and therefore I cant get the ship. So to that end I'm giving away a cracking void egg in the Hope's it is useful for someone. DISCLAIMER IT DOES NOT GIVE YOU THE STARBIRTH QUEST. I don't know if it will be useful to anyone else but I dont wanna trash it if is useful. It is completely free but if you're feeling kind, i will accept a normal void egg #128513;
Thought that would be the case but just wanted to be sure I couldn't help anyone out

WRITING.TEXT: Is there any lovely people out there that have an extra void egg they could donate to me? I'm on normal mode
